name: Airsoft- Cursed Field
description:
Avialable in English and Russian

Airsoft player stuck in the cursed training field, full of monsters. Your objective is to escape the building, staying alive.
During your escape you will face some reenactors, paintballers and cheaters.
Collect BBs and red rags, drink soda, have fun

Shooter with elements of puzzle

You can also visit a group of this game in social networks:

http://vk.com/airsoftindie

Use the link below to get it on your Android
